text: yaqinan hum aap se pehle bhi bahuth se rasool bhej chuke hai, jin mein se baaz ke (waqeyaath) hum aap ko bayaan kar chuke hai aur un mein se baaz ke (qisse) to hum ne aap ko bayaan hee nahi kiye aur kisi rasool ka ye (maghdoor) na tha ke koyi maujeze Allah ki ijaazath ke baghair la sa ke, phir jis waqt Allah ka hukm ayega, haq ke saath faisla kar diya jayega aur us jageh ahle baatil qasaare mein reh jayenge
